Text: This is shite. Terrible quality. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
torrent didn't work right in vlc and 99 percent does
It works fine on my vlc, it's just in a stupid format that is mostly only good for mobile devices or vlc but not much else.  Hopefully someone will soon upload in a more widely accepted format.
Plus rar - ugh.  I thought we are past that.

http://lifehacker.com/367558/fix-desynchronized-video-and-audio-with-vlc

there there lass, don't cry. It's free.
using VLC audio track sync (hastened) -0.300 s its pretty close.

This is very fine to watch if you use VLC and adjust the sync as follows: in Windows, keep hitting the "J" key until it says -500 ms; on a Mac, keep hitting the "F" key until it says -500 ms.

See http://www.specialops.co.nz/blog/sync-audio-in-vlc/

Yeah, this is a pain, but at least *somebody* uploaded this program!
Everything is OK. Set audio delay to make it good -650
